summary: Build a cool luxury-brand website for The3GareebsGantu Cafe based on the provided brand/UX blueprint (homepage + About, Menu, Gallery, Contact) with mobile-first, animated modern UI.
architectural_notes: Project is a luxury-brand cafe marketing website with pages: Home, About, Menu, Gallery, Contact.
Mobile experience is critical (thumb-friendly CTAs, one-tap call, WhatsApp button, fast-loading images).
UI style direction: rounded corners, soft shadows, micro-animations, parallax scrolling, sticky navigation.
Add a short content-editing guide (README or docs page) explaining where to change copy, menu data config, and how to replace image assets in /public/assets/generated (or equivalent).

existing_features.title: Implement a cohesive luxury-youthful visual theme for The3GareebsGantu Cafe across the entire site using the provided palette and typography direction: Deep Charcoal Black (#121212), Warm Coffee Brown (#4B2E2E), Creamy Beige (#F3ECDC) with accents Gold Foil (#D4AF37), Burnt Orange (#E86B2F), Soft Sage Green (#8FA39A); headings in Playfair Display style and body in Poppins/Inter style; rounded corners, soft shadows, micro-animations, parallax accents, and a sticky navigation.

Create the required site pages and routing/navigation: Home, About, Menu, Gallery, Contact. Ensure navigation includes primary CTAs (View Menu, Visit Us) and footer includes logo/brand line, Instagram link, phone number, and address.

Build the Home page to match the provided structure: (1) Hero section with cinematic food video-like feel (use a performant fallback if video is not available) + dark overlay, headline “Luxury Taste. Street Soul.”, subtext, primary CTA “View Menu”, secondary CTA “Visit Us”; (2) Social proof strip with star rating and 3 short quotes; (3) Signature dishes grid of 4 cards (Red Sauce Pasta, Paneer Pizza, Cold Coffee, Signature Mocktails) with photo, name, one-liner; (4) “Why People Love Us” icon grid; (5) Atmosphere gallery masonry grid with caption; (6) Testimonials slider; (7) Location & hours section with embedded map and “Get Directions” CTA.

Build the About page with the specified headline and story content, using on-brand layout and imagery. Include the headline “Born Hungry. Built With Love.” and the provided story text, formatted for readability (sections, callouts, or pull quotes).

Build the Menu page with category sections (Pastas, Pizzas, Shakes, Mocktails, Coffee, Add-ons). Each menu item should display photo, name, short description, and price, and support highlight badges such as “Best Seller” and “Chef’s Choice”. Provide a clean way to maintain menu data as a single constant/config in the frontend (no admin UI required).
Build the Gallery page as a responsive grid with hover effect (soft zoom) and the tagline “Every Corner is Camera Ready”. Use a masonry-like layout on desktop and a performant grid on mobile.
Build the Contact page with a simple contact form (Name, Phone, Message) plus a map, phone, and Instagram link. Include prominent mobile actions: one-tap call button and WhatsApp chat button.

Implement mobile-first performance and UX requirements: thumb-friendly button sizes, fast-loading images, responsive spacing/typography, and smooth but lightweight animations (avoid heavy parallax on low-end devices).

Ensure copywriting tone is applied throughout the site: friendly, confident, slightly playful, never corporate. Include at least one playful warning-style line (e.g., “Warning: Our pasta may ruin other cafés for you.”) in an appropriate section (Home or Menu).

Add optional conversion boosters as non-blocking UI components that can be toggled on/off via a simple config: limited-time combo banner, student discount badge, and placeholders for Instagram feed embed + Google review widget (do not require third-party API keys; allow simple iframe/embed-link-based integration).
Add generated static image assets to support the brand experience and wire them into the UI from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve images via the backend).

Add a developer-facing content editing guide that explains exactly how to change website text, images, menu items, contact details, and optional promo widgets in the codebase for The3GareebsGantu Cafe site.

new_feature_requests.summary: Design and build the The3GareebsGantu Cafe website following the provided brand DNA, UI style, and page structure (Home, About, Menu, Gallery, Contact).

Add a simple Motoko backend API to store and retrieve Contact form submissions. Include: createMessage(name, phone, message) and listMessages() for future admin use. Persist data in stable storage suitable for canister upgrades (add migration only if/when state schema changes).
Provide simple guidance/documentation for how to update site content (text, images, menu items) in the codebase (which files/paths to edit, how to replace assets).
